name: TRIUMPH Bonneville 900cc
description:
Online Pricing is for 24 hours per unit/day. Insurance is required and not included in online price. Special 8 hour pricing starting at $49 is available, please call us for more details, 407-583-6988

Reservation Inquiry/CONFIRMATION. Please select number of days you would like to reserve and specify Month/Day/Year in message to MC2Rent. Our representative will immediately confirm your reservation or refund your payment within 24 hours or less, if no bikes are available for the dates you choose. You can contact us prior to making this reservation to make certain the bike of your choice is available on the dates you requested. Your payment is 100% refunded if bikes are unavailable for your requested dates after reservation is CONFIRMED. Cancellation policy is within two weeks of rental date, but not later than 60 days from date reservation is made. Please be advised payment will not be refunded if renter does not have a valid Driver's License including motorcycle endorsement (from their home country). MC2Rent will make final decision under all circumstances regarding rental agreement. Unit of Payment is equal to one day's rental, plus state sales tax (6.5%), EXCLUDING insurance. Please update quantity for total amount of rental days in the shopping cart. A Security Deposit equal to insurance deductible ($1000) will be processed and reserved on your credit card at time of rental motorcycle delivery and until bike is returned free of damage as outlined in Rental Agreement. Supplemental Liability Insurance is optionally available for $4.95 per day. SLI is excessive liability insurance that protects you, as defined in the rental agreement, against third party automobile claims for bodily injury and property damage caused during permitted use of rental vehicle.
